decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( PL.0110, PL.0112, PL.0109, PL.0108, PL.0001, PL.0002, PL.0003, PL.0004, PL.0005, PL.0111, PL.106, design and access statement by Spratley Studios - All Received 9/12/15

Cycle works Josta 2 tier high capacity rack specification
PL.107 Rev A - Received 11/02/16) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details
description:
External alterations to vehicular routes, hard and soft landscaping alterations, recladding of substation, demolition and replacement of smoking shelter and gas meter
housing and provision of new cycle store. Amendments to parking layout, provision of new pedestrian access from public footpath. Replacement of existing revolving door
to reception.
